content.html: OFCOM created UK phone numbers which aren't real but do ring to use in TV shows (like the US "555" numbers). Next time an app or website wants your phone number for no good non-spam reason, give it one of these. 07700 900000 and 0121 496 0000 are good. ofcom.org.uk/phones-telecom…
content.value:
OFCOM created UK phone numbers  which aren't real but do ring to use in TV shows (like the US "555" numbers).
Next time an app or website wants your phone number for no good non-spam reason, give it one of these. 07700 900000 and 0121 496 0000 are good.

ofcom.org.uk/phones-telecom…
